import React from 'react'; import {Button} from './Button'; import {Link} from 'react-router-dom'; import './HeroSection.css'; function HeroSection({ lightBg,topline,lightText,lightTextDesc,headline,description1,description2,description3,buttonLabel,img,alt,imgStart }) { return (
{topline}

{headline}

  • {description1}

  • {description2}

  • {description3}

) } export default HeroSection
